title: onDemandEntries
preview: Next.js exposes some options that give you some control over how the server will dispose or keep in memory built pages in development. To change the defaults, open `next.config.js` and add the `onDemandEntries` config: next.config.js [Code Block] Was this helpful? supported. Send
